engineering_bay.name: Engineering Bay
engineering_bay.desc: This room houses all of the equipment the ship's engineers need to keep the place running. Usually abuzz with mechanical whirring, it is eerily silent.

ruined_hallway.name: Ruined Hallway
ruined_hallway.desc: Tons of wreckage and debris fill this hallway. There is evidence of a fire, but the low-oxygen environment now present has starved them of a fuel source.

bridge.name: Bridge
bridge.desc: This is where an Admiral will command his vessel. The ship's AI MAC-GFN's central processing unit is located here.

admirals_quarters.name: Admiral's Quarters
admirals_quarters.desc: This is where the Admiral rests and relaxes when he is off-duty.

med_bay.name: Medical Bay
med_bay.desc: The cupboards are packed with all sorts of medical supplies. Numerous hospital beds hidden by plastic divider curtains fill the room.

hallway_a.name: Hallway A
hallway_a.desc: The futuristic hallway covered in shiny white panels. A large letter 'A' adorns one side in stylish yellow highlights.

hallway_b.name: Hallway B
hallway_b.desc: The futuristic hallway covered in shiny white panels. A large letter 'B' adorns one side in stylish green highlights.

reactor.name: Reactor Room
reactor.desc: The room hums with power from the ship's antimatter reactor. You probably shouldn't touch anything in here...

recreation_center.name: Recreation Center
recreation_center.desc:
This room is filled with different types of exercise equipment. It is currently in disarray though. Most of the equipment has been knocked over, and the east 
half of the room's roof has collapsed over top of what used to be a yoga studio.
